item.description:
Come on out everyone to a favorite Boston locale for the best ale brewed by Fenway Dwarves! It's not a game day so parking is cheaper. The Green line to Kenmore station will get you there as well.

The beer's good. The food's good. Come meet fellow D&D players and get your game on!

For more information, see http://www.beerworks....

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: June Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup
